name: bj-nimn

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wn(wi(w0, wn(w0))))
-| wi(wi(w0, wn(w0)), wn(w0))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wn(wi(w0, wn(w0))))
-| wi(wi(w0, wn(w0)), wn(w0))

comment: If a formula is true, then it does not imply its negation. (Contributed by BJ, 19-Mar-2020.) A shorter proof is possible using ~ id and ~ jc , however, the present proof uses theorems that are more basic than ~ jc . (Proof modification is discouraged.)
